issue.title: [Python][Doc] Fix error in code example for extension types
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-9576](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-9576). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
There is an error in the example code using an undefined variable `arr` instead of `self` here https://arrow.apache.org/docs/python/extending_types.html#conversion-to-pandas

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-9576?focusedCommentId=17166041) by Kouhei Sutou (kou):*
Issue resolved by pull request 7845
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/7845>
